entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
